alert.note: Alert for Teton (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 2:29PM MDT until August 26 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Teton County in northwestern Wyoming... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 228 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Old Faithful, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Scaup Lake and Shoshone Lake around 235 PM MDT. Craig Pass and Fountain Paint Pot around 240 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
